name: Xournal
description: Xournal is an editor for note-taking and sketching. It can be used to take notes, make marks, draft and draw. Also it can make annotations in PDF.

en_US.description: Xournal is an editor for note-taking and sketching. It can be used to take notes, make marks, draft and draw. Also it can make annotations in PDF.
en_US.name: Xournal

zh_CN.description: Xournal是一个书写备忘笔记、草图的编辑工具，可以使用它来做笔记、随手标记、打草稿、画图等，同时还可以给PDF做注解。
zh_CN.name: Xournal
